definition: lacking refinement or cultivation or taste
details:
adjective
- lacking refinement or cultivation or taste
= example: lacking refinement or cultivation or taste
= synonyms: common
- of textures that are rough to the touch or substances consisting of relatively large particles
= example: of textures that are rough to the touch or substances consisting of relatively large particles
= synonyms: harsh
- of low or inferior quality or value
= example: of low or inferior quality or value
= synonyms: common
